name: Start game
description: Oh no! Did I oversleep? I cannot miss this interview.

name: wall pic
description: Ugh I wish I could skip this interview to play minecraft. But either I find a job or starve to death.

name: Safe
description: How dumb are you to have a safe in the middle of a bar? That's not very safe.

name: salon door
description: Locking all the good stuff? Gotta be some paranoid owners.

name: coin
description: Kinda nasty. But I'll take it.

name: box
description: Alright me, it's not just a bar we're escaping - it's the clutches of unemployment. Let's beat this puzzle.

name: key to salon
description: A key! This could be for the locked door. I really need to get to that interview.

name: martini
description: No time to drink now! I have an interview to catch. I should hurry.

name: painting
description: No time for admiring pretty paintings! I have to get out of here.

name: toilet stall door
description: Don't need the toilet right now.

name: vent
description: A vent. Too small for me to crawl through.
